languages.text: "Вы прекрасно знаете, что гибель проктора на вашем судне немедленно привлекла бы внимание Арбитес и поставила бы династию под удар. Вы не пошли бы на такой риск".

"You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."
languages.original_text: "Вы прекрасно знаете, что гибель проктора на вашем судне немедленно привлекла бы внимание Арбитес и поставила бы династию под удар. Вы не пошли бы на такой риск".

traits.locale_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

"You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

"You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

"You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

"You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, dass der Tod des Proktors auf Eurem Schiff sofort die Aufmerksamkeit des Adeptus Arbites erregt und Eure Dynastie gefährdet hätte. Dieses Risiko würdet Ihr niemals eingehen."
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, dass der Tod des Proktors auf Eurem Schiff sofort die Aufmerksamkeit des Adeptus Arbites erregt und Eure Dynastie gefährdet hätte. Dieses Risiko würdet Ihr niemals eingehen."

languages.text: « Vous savez parfaitement que la mort du proctor à bord de votre vaisseau aurait immédiatement attiré l'attention de l'Adeptus Arbites et mis en péril votre dynastie. Vous n'auriez pas pris ce risque. »
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez parfaitement que la mort du proctor à bord de votre vaisseau aurait immédiatement attiré l'attention de l'Adeptus Arbites et mis en péril votre dynastie. Vous n'auriez pas pris ce risque. »

languages.text: “你很清楚，如果监察官死在了你的船上，这恐怕会立刻引起法务部的注意，也会将你的王朝置于危险之中。你是不会冒这个险的。”
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: “你很清楚，如果监察官死在了你的船上，这恐怕会立刻引起法务部的注意，也会将你的王朝置于危险之中。你是不会冒这个险的。”

languages.text: «Sabe perfectamente que la muerte del Procurador a bordo de su nave habría llamado inmediatamente la atención del Adeptus Arbites, lo que pondría en peligro su dinastía. No se arriesgaría a ello».
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe perfectamente que la muerte del Procurador a bordo de su nave habría llamado inmediatamente la atención del Adeptus Arbites, lo que pondría en peligro su dinastía. No se arriesgaría a ello».

languages.text: 「あなたはよく知っているはずです。あなたの船の中で代理人が死ねば、直ちに高等裁定局の注目を浴び、あなたの王朝は危機に晒されることになると。あなたがそんなリスクを冒すはずがないのです」
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはよく知っているはずです。あなたの船の中で代理人が死ねば、直ちに高等裁定局の注目を浴び、あなたの王朝は危機に晒されることになると。あなたがそんなリスクを冒すはずがないのです」

languages.text: "Geminde bulunan Üsteğmen ölse bütün Adeptus Arbites başına toplanır, hanedanlığın tehlikeye girerdi. Bu riski tabii ki de almayacaktın."
languages.original_text: "You know perfectly well that the death of the Proctor on board your ship would have immediately drawn the attention of the Adeptus Arbites and placed your dynasty in jeopardy. You would not take that risk."

traits.locale_text: "Geminde bulunan Üsteğmen ölse bütün Adeptus Arbites başına toplanır, hanedanlığın tehlikeye atılırdı. Bu riski tabii ki almayacaktın."
